fixes.name: Discount Tier

IF(
    'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Discount Health] > 0.25,
    "High Discount",
    IF(
        'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Discount Health] > 0.10,
        "Medium Discount",
        "Low Discont"
    )
)
